title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.10 - Machines locked at off time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.10 - Machines locked at off time

State Regulations

The pari-mutuel machines will be locked by electrical
control or by the State steward immediately upon the opening of the stall doors
of the starting gate on the signal of the starter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4009.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
